description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Catch falling snowflakes that fall faster and faster as you progress. Special snowflakes improve your snowflake collector, but watch out for the bad snowflakes which will damage it! Get more points by not missing any snowflakes and by catching them sooner. Get the highest score on each of five different game modes!
description.short: Catch falling snowflakes that fall faster and faster as you progress. Special snowflakes improve your snowflake collector, but watch out for the bad snowflakes which will damage it! Get more points by not missing any snowflakes and by catching them sooner. Get the highest score on each of five different game modes!
